::Zardus::

Zardus recieves Wheeljack's message, replying. "Excellent. I'll be
there soon, I'm taking care of something right now."


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Ramjet/Wheeljack/Scourge:::
> 
> Ramjet: I think it should only be Cygnar and i who talk the
Alliance. The 
> rest of you should go to their mess hall, get a drink, and wait.
> ::Ramjet follows Drillbit to the conference room and sits down
across from 
> him::
> ~~~~~
> Wheeljack: Yes, i think we are.
> ::He opens his comm::
> Wheeljack: Commander Zardus, we have finished building the repair
station.
> ~~~~~
> Scourge: Im Scourge, former leader of the sweeps.  Autofire, huh?
How do you 
> know Megatron?
